title: [Feature Request] Add Model Name to the annotations database
body:
Hello @regel . First let me  congratulate for this wonderful tool.

After playing with loudml.. I've seen there is no way to diferentiate annotations from models, there is no tag `model` or something similar.

So there is no way to filter annotations from each model.

This is how I've seen in my influxdb.

```
> select * from annotations where time > now()-10h;
name: annotations
time                deleted id                                   modified_time_ns    start_time          text                                                                          type
----                ------- --                                   ----------------    ----------          ----                                                                          ----
1595996400000000000 false   7b58a3ca-a0bf-45b0-9545-6dcbfc9b1274 1595996400000000000 1595996400000000000 feature 'mean_usage_system' is too low (score = 100.0)                        loudml
1595996700000000000 false   0feaea49-ca40-4497-9f09-99efbc7dace2 1595996700000000000 1595996700000000000 feature 'mean_usage_system' is too high (score = 100.0)                       loudml
1595997000000000000 false   b2de4b76-e6a3-4169-802e-a893bd1aed34 1595997000000000000 1595997000000000000 feature 'mean_usage_system' is too low (score = 100.0)                        loudml
1595997300000000000 false   b37d076e-b2c1-4a41-916d-4d00964214b2 1595997300000000000 1595997300000000000 feature 'mean_usage_system[host:oss_mon_influx1]' is too high (score = 99.8)  loudml
1595997600000000000 false   20ca390c-9105-4b23-8bae-751529ee01ae 1595997600000000000 1595997600000000000 feature 'mean_usage_system' is too low (score = 100.0)                        loudml
1595997900000000000 false   6b69d575-ffe9-4682-b1d1-27d1b638f95a 1595997900000000000 1595997900000000000 feature 'mean_usage_system' is too low (score = 100.0)                        loudml
```


I hope someone could add this feature.

Thank you very much!
